answers.answer: When.I was 37 weeks he was estimated at 9lb. My Dr is having me wait it out and labor. I'm very nervous
My first was delivered via csection at 35wks at 7lbs 2oz due to complications. They also thought I had gd, but nope just a big baby!
My last u/s was at 32/4 weeks and he was estimating at 5lb1oz he was at 68 percentile. They don't expect me to carry upt o 36 weeks I'll b 35 on Monday

Gosh wait it out :(  goodness sounds painful hes not even 7lbs and its alot of pressure for me!  Im overweight and gained like 40lbs all together but i dont have diabetes and my bp was 124/70 they said that was good.  Baby was 84% percentile today.   She said birth no matter when will be over 90 and 90 is hi as it can go on that scale.

At 34 weeks my daughter was measuring about 4 pounds, 11 ounces. She is my third and I have inky gained about 15 pounds. I just generally have 6-7pound babies and that is big enough for me :) good luck!!

My baby is also measuring 2-3wks ahead,  she's estimated weight of 5lb at 30+3 days..  They are inducing me at 36-37wks I will know more when I go back on 11th of Nov, as I do suffer gd , which is so hard to control I just know when I go back they gonna put me on tablets but I've cut every sugar item out literally on salads and veg but still get mess up readings,  anyways this worries me so much about a big baby I've had two other pregnancy and both my babies had been under 7 and half lbs,  so I'm literally pooping myself,  im sure they will have to give you a call section earlier than 39wks if growth continues..

Oh BTW before pregnancy I was in the healthy bmi range,  so not overweight I do howevver have strong family backgrounds with diabetes which as caused me to get it,  I just hope it disappears after having my baby cause it's very worrisome

Hi mama...at 33 weeks my baby girl was 6 lbs!!! I dont have GD nor i am overweight, my belly is pretty small but is my third pregnancy, i only gained around 8 kg...just wait till the baby comes in case it is a really big baby read about Mc Roberts maneouvre and gasking Maneouvre in case that you will have a macrosomic baby. Take lots of care and enjoy your pregnancy!!!
P.S: Don't forget the weight is just stimated and they can have your due date a bit off!!!

The weight is a guess, they can be 2lb out either way, I was told mine was 4lb 6 at 30 weeks, I am hoping they leave me be so I can go into labour after Christmas and new year. My due date is3rd Jan. They do seem to like telling us mummies that we are having big babies!!! Did u elect a c section? I am pro choice, as in its your choice. So hopefully if they turn around and say need get baby out now, u can say ok I will prep for theatre :) x

question: What do you mommies think of 6lbs 9oz at 33 weeks 5 days?  He is also super low in pelvis.  The ultrasound laded said im measuring 2 or 3 weeks ahead.  She guessed ill only bake for.maybe a couple weeks.   But new state law is i cant have my csection (repeat) any earlier than 39 weeks scheduled.  Im so stressed its crazy, tomorrow is my baby shower.  My due date is dec 7th
title: baby huge and low in pelvic HELP
